structure.unit: Chapter 17C METROPOLITAN DADE COUNTY DEMOLITION OF MOBILE HOMES AND REMOVAL OF DEBRIS FROM MOBILE HOME PARKS RENDERED UNINHABITABLE BY HURRICANE ANDREW AFTER ITS AFTERMATH

text.section:
Sec. 17C-14. Preservation of personal property.
The Minimum Housing Enforcement Officer and/or Army Corps shall undertake reasonable efforts to transport and secure items or personalty, not immediately transportable by the owners and which do not pose any health or safety hazard as may be determined by the Minimum Housing Enforcement Officer or Army Corps.
